comment: /** * Returns an analyzer mapped to the given name or null if not present */
code: /** * Returns an analyzer mapped to the given name or null if not present */ public NamedAnalyzer get(String name) { return analyzers.get(name). }

comment: /** * Returns a normalizer mapped to the given name or null if not present */
code: /** * Returns a normalizer mapped to the given name or null if not present */ public NamedAnalyzer getNormalizer(String name) { return normalizers.get(name). }

comment: /** * Returns a normalizer that splits on whitespace mapped to the given name or null if not present */
code: /** * Returns a normalizer that splits on whitespace mapped to the given name or null if not present */ public NamedAnalyzer getWhitespaceNormalizer(String name) { return whitespaceNormalizers.get(name). }

comment: /**  * Returns the default index analyzer for this index  */
code: /**  * Returns the default index analyzer for this index  */ public NamedAnalyzer getDefaultIndexAnalyzer() {     return defaultIndexAnalyzer. }

comment: /**  * Returns the default search analyzer for this index  */
code: /**  * Returns the default search analyzer for this index  */ public NamedAnalyzer getDefaultSearchAnalyzer() {     return defaultSearchAnalyzer. }

comment: /**  * Returns the default search quote analyzer for this index  */
code: /**  * Returns the default search quote analyzer for this index  */ public NamedAnalyzer getDefaultSearchQuoteAnalyzer() {     return defaultSearchQuoteAnalyzer. }

@Override public void close() throws IOException {     IOUtils.close(() -> Stream.concat(analyzers.values().stream(), normalizers.values().stream()).filter(a -> a.scope() == AnalyzerScope.INDEX).iterator()). }
/**  * Returns the indices settings  */ public IndexSettings getIndexSettings() {     return indexSettings. }
